meanings.definition: To address directly or mention in a speech or piece of writing.
meanings.sent1: During the play, the actor apostrophized the audience, asking for their support.
meanings.sent2: She apostrophized her favorite author in her letter, expressing her admiration.
meanings.sent3: The teacher apostrophized the misbehaving student, hoping to get their attention.
meanings.sent4: The politician apostrophized the crowd, promising positive changes.
meanings.sent5: The coach apostrophized the team, urging them to give their best effort.
